Author: 東篱
ReMark: 这是一款跨界的通用大模型。说她跨界，因为她从写实、幻想、3D、2.5D、漫画到插画；从东西方人物、国风、花鸟到动物，都有非常优异的表现力。我花了我很长的时间，跑了近万张图来测试她。你甚至不需要LoRA与开启高清修复，就可以直出非常好的炸裂的效果（具体请看我的样张，均无LoRA直出的图）。她与Firefly（萤火虫）为同一个系列。如果说Firefly代表的是那个喜欢二次元的童真时代，那么Butterfly是我们已经长大了，破蚕成蝶，遂取名Butterfly（蝴蝶）。我一直认为一个好的大模型应该具有通用性，人物有更多的风格，而不是千人一面的太倾向于一个固定的风格（这个可交给LoRA解决）。因此，在测试这个模型的时候，我更多关注的依然是：模型对光影的表现力；人物面部特征与脸型的多元性，以及人物的服饰，发型、手部等细节的表现力；大场景的表现力；模型的色彩、构图以及主体与背景的统一性；模型对LoRA的兼容性；模型对不同画面风格提示词的响应等等。你可以使用提示词illustrator 、Anime ,Comic、Watercolor 、Oil Painting 、Photographic 、Digital Art 、Fantasy Art 、Neon Punk 、Low Poly 、Line Art 、3D Model 、Pixel Art来测试她的反映。模型对机械、机甲、动植物等元素的表现力；Anyway, CGArt Butterfly绝对、绝对、绝对值得你收藏她，驾驭她(重要的事情说三遍，哈哈)！如果你马良，她必将是你手里的画笔，轻松将你的奇思妙想变成现实。非常期待小伙们返图测试驾驭她，她惊人的表现力，不会让你失望的。让我们一起创作世界吧！给喜欢Butterfly的同学们一个大大大大的熊抱！爱你们哟！建议参数：•CFG Scale:3-9(7是最稳定与保守的值，低于7偏真实，高于偏幻想）•Clip skip: 2•Sampler : Restar、DPM++2M Karras（首选Restar）•Sampling steps : 25-30（太高的值收效甚微，浪费时间）•Hires step : 4x-UltraSharp（一般情况可以不用高清修复）•VAE：已内置关于版本：默认的是以SD1.5为底模的版本，后缀XL的即为SDXL1.0为底模的版本。0.10与0.10XL两个版本都效果炸裂，不逊色任何一款大模型，且有更强的跨界能力，示例的样张，全部为无LoRA直出的效果。提示词写法建议：1、Photography / Photorealistic图片风格提示词：photographic of <你的提示词>. BREAK, 35mm photograph, grainy, professional, 4k, highly detailed, bokeh反向提示词： drawing, painting, crayon, sketch, graphite, impressionist, noisy, blurry, soft, deformed, ugly例如：photorealistic of a woman sitting at a cafe.  BREAK,  35mm photograph,  grainy,  professional,  8k,  highly detailed,  Leica M50 F/2.8小技巧：你可以将bokeh（焦散）换成更为专业的提示词，例如：Shot by Leica M50 F/1.9、Shot by Hasselblad XCD 80mmF/1.9感受不相机镜头所带来的色彩与焦外的美。Photography与Photorealistic会有细微的不同，后者偏向写实义摄影。加入BREAK是防止色彩污染，你也可以去掉，看看效果变化。2、Cinematic电影风格提示词：cinematic film still,<你的提示词> . BREAK, shallow depth of field, vignette, highly detailed, high budget Hollywood movie, bokeh, cinema scope, moody反向提示语：anime, cartoon, graphic, text, painting, crayon, graphite, abstract, glitch, deformed, mutated, ugly, disfigured3、Analog film胶片电影滤镜风格提示词：analog film photo of<你的提示词>. BREAK, faded film, desaturated, 35mm photo, grainy, vignette, vintage, Kodachrome, Lomography, stained, highly detailed, found footage反向提示词：painting, drawing, illustration, glitch, deformed, mutated, cross-eyed, ugly, disfigured例如，你把<你的提示词>替换成这段提示词试试效果：a girl about 20 years old, clear facial contour, upper body, looking at viewer, Beautiful dynamic dramatic dark moody lighting, volumetric, shadows, art atmosphere4、Anime动画风格提示词：anime artwork<你的提示词>. BREAK, anime style, key visual, vibrant, studio anime, highlydetailed反向提示词：photo, deformed, black and white, realism, disfigured,lowcontrast例如：anime artwork an island surrounding by the sea, dramatic. BREAK, anime style, key visual, vibrant, studio anime, highly detailed5、Digital Art / Concept Art数字艺术/概念艺术提示词：concept art of<你的提示词>. digital artwork, illustrative, painterly, matte painting, highly detailed反向提示词：photo, photorealistic, realism, ugly例如：concept art of a warrior with a sword, clouds. digital artwork, illustrative, painterly, matte painting, highly detailed, cinematic composition6、Fantasy Art幻想艺术提示词：ethereal fantasy concept art of<你的提示词> . magnificent, celestial, ethereal, painterly, epic, majestic, magical, fantasy art, cover art, dreamy反向提示词：photographic, realistic, realism, 35mm film, DSLR, cropped, frame, text, deformed, glitch, noise, noisy, off-center, deformed, cross-eyed, closed eyes, bad anatomy, ugly, disfigured, sloppy, duplicate, mutated, black and white例如：ethereal例如：ethereal fantasy concept art of sorceress casting spells. magnificent, celestial, ethereal, painterly, epic, majestic, magical, fantasy art, cover art, dreamy7、Comic Book漫画风格提示词：comic book style.<你的提示词> .professional detailed graphic novel illustration, intricate line work, intricate strokes反向提示词：anime face, ugly, old, anime style, cartoonish, anime face, photorealistic, nude, (poorly drawn face, cross-eyed), sweaty skin, latex clothes, low fidelity例如：comic book style,Handsome man wearing a bulky fur coat, detailed hair, sitting in a well lit warm log wood cabin indoors, winter time, cozy scene, detailed reflective eyes, holding a book and lantern, warm lighting, (stormy snow window in the background), luxurious lodge, professional detailed graphic novel illustration, intricate line work, intricate strokes8、通用提示词提示词：breathtaking<你的提示词> . award-winning, professional, highly detailed反向提示词：anime, cartoon, graphic, text, painting, crayon, graphite, abstract glitch, blurry例如：breathtaking night street of Shanghai, neon lights. award-winning, professional, highly detailed-----忧愁的分割线--------------------------------我的其它模型介绍Flyingsnow（飞雪）：2.3D的通用模型；Flyingsnow Kite(风筝)：偏平涂风格的2次元模型；CGArt Firefly：二次元通用大模型；CGArt Butterfly：超写实、幻想通用大模型，主打3D幻想风格，兼顾写实；CGArt Mayfly：真人写实大模型，写实、唯美、东西方人物、风景、场景、国风CGArt Dragonfly：2.5通用大模型，与 Flyingsnow.是不同风格的模型。
